features:
Lightweight, portable massage stick
Designed with AcuGrip silicone surface to effectively grip skin while rolling
Slim, ergonomic handles make it easy to control and leverage pressure for targeting hard to reach muscle knots
Engineered for user controlled pressure to reduce muscle soreness and increase circulation for quick muscle recovery after a workout or recovering from an injury
Massage lower and upper body muscle groups, including calf, hamstring, quadriceps, and back to improve mobility
Can be used either seated or standing
Compact and travel-friendly size at 2” W x 18” L, 1 lb
Sweat proof and easy to clean
